name: True Nature (of Man)
description:
Hi everyone, this is one of the projects I made with Unity for my third and final year at the University. I am  more than happy to receive any constructive criticism.

This short piece is only a 'chapter' of a bigger game that, hopefully, I will develop one day. It contains some bugs and only a small fraction of the overall narrative, nonetheless I hope you have fun playing it! :)

Discover the mystery of a man that climbed one of the highest peaks in the world. In this first person narrative-based game, you will play the role of a Free solo Climber who, accidentally, finds the remains of a man who lived alone on top of one of the highest mountains known to man.

CONTROLS: 

- W,A,S,D (Movement)

- Left Mouse Button (LMB) (Examine / Interact Objects )

- Right Mouse Button (RMB) (Examine / Interact Objects )

Role: Game Designer, Level Designer, Narrative Designer, QA Tester.

(Check Out the brilliant Game Developer who helped me with this project: Jasmine Carcangiu).

-Music produced by my amazing father: Cesare Mascellino.

P.S. Check out my website for previous projects (Games and Environments) and future ones! Thanks! :D
